Traits.Name: Tactical Targeting
Traits.Content: The Assault Drone has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within 5 feet of it and not behind total cover.

Traits.Name: Ramming Maneuver
Traits.Content: When the Assault Drone uses its movement to make a melee attack, it can add its proficiency bonus to the damage dealt.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Assault Drone makes three attacks: one with its Assault Cannon and two with its Ramming Charge.

Actions.Name: Assault Cannon
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be knocked prone, suffering from a disorienting blast until removed, reducing its attack rolls by 1 until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Ramming Charge
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 3 + 1d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away and become affected by short-lived circuitry overload, causing it to have disadvantage on the next attack roll.

Actions.Name: Overload Burst
Actions.Content: The Assault Drone targets any creature it has damaged with its Ramming Charge. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d6 + 3) lightning damage and suffer an overload condition until the end of the creature's next turn, imposing disadvantage on skill checks and attack rolls.
